MainPage.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm Papita con Pure. This sife offers updated information about me, my networks and projects. Also, for individuals, groups, or organizations with inquiries, doubts, complaints, suggestions, etc., I offer some public contact information <1>here</1>.
MainPage.qnaQ1: Why do you call yourself "Papita con Pure"?
MainPage.qnaA1:
It's a name written in Spanish, meaning "Lil Potato with Mashed Potatoes". One morning many years ago, aroud 3AM, I was making an account on some game to play with friends. Thing is, I was hungry as heck, a bit sleepy, and was also already thinking of replacing my older nickname. That's how it came to exist.

"Papita con Pur√©" doesn't really make sense, even in Spanish. It's just a combo of two foods you can't really combine. However, it's still funny, and people that don't speak Spanish can call me "Papita" and it doesn't sound half bad.
MainPage.qnaQ2: Ever thought of uploading your games to Steam?
MainPage.qnaA2: Getting your game on Steam costs an upfront of US$100. It's something I strongly desire, but having a page there will have to wait.
MainPage.qnaQ3: Ever thought of uploading your music to Spotify or SoundCloud?
MainPage.qnaA3:
I have no intentions of doing that right now. With just a YouTube channel I feel pretty comfortable, for now.

However, <1>ZFF</1> uploads my music to SoundCloud every once in a while.

Also, if I participate in collabs and another person uploads the music, there's a chance it may be on SoundCloud/Spotify/other, as I have no issues with that.
